description:
Your home away from home! If you are looking for a spacious one bedroom filled with everything you could need to be comfortable and ideally situated, then this is your apt!  Newly renovated, high ceiling, modern fixtures, full kitchen, wifi....

Modern, stylish, newly renovated, minimal, spacious and comfortable

The entire apt which includes kitchen, living space, bathroom and bedroom

I will do my best to greet each guest and provide customized recommendations. Anything you need, just ask!

Lots of charming restaurants and bars. One stop away from Bedford(heart of Williamsburg), 2 stops from Manhattan and 3 stops from Bushwick(fill with artistic spaces and edge venues.
name: Williamsburg stylish home!
